mysteryDungeon:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
mysteryDungeon:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

mysteryDungeon:NatureRelatedRelic.NAME: Nature Related Relic
DESCRIPTIONS: You will receive a relic that depends on your nature.

mysteryDungeon:CalmExplorerRelic.NAME: Calm Explorer
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw 1 card and gain [E] at the start of every fight.

mysteryDungeon:HardyExplorerRelic.NAME: Hardy Explorer
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you take unblocked damage each turn, gain 3 Block.
